videos.description: Bogdan Bogdanovic picks up a steal and quickly lobs to John Collins for an alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bogdanovic steals and lobs to Collins) 2021/04/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bogdanovic steals and lobs to Collins
